parsedContentPreview: {"id":"egy_beg_num_01","title":{"arabic":"الأرقام من واحد لمية","english":"Numbers from 1 to 100","transliteration":"Al-arqam min wahid le meyya"},"level":"beginner","description":{"english":"In this lesson, you will learn how to count from 1 to 100 in Egyptian Arabic. This is essential for shopping, telling your age, and dealing with money.","arabic":"في الدرس ده، هنتعلم نعد من 1 لـ 100 بالمصري. ده مهم جداً عشان الشراء، وتقول سنك، وتتعامل بالفلوس."},"learningObjectives":["Count from 1 to 10 fluently","Understand the pattern for numbers 11 to 99","Say '100'","Use numbers to express prices and quantities"],"estimatedDuration":20,"prerequisites":[],"subLessons":[{"id":"sl_01_basic_1_10","title":{"arabic":"الأرقام من ١ لـ ١٠","english":"Numbers from 1 to 10","transliteration":"Al-arqam min wahid le ashara"},"content":{"title":{"arabic":"العد الأساسي","english":"Basic Counting","transliteration":"Al-add al-asasi"},"phrases":[{"arabic":"واحد","english":"One","transliteration":"Wahid"},{"arabic":"اتنين","english":"Two","transliteration":"Etnein"},{"arabic":"تلاتة","english":"Three","transliteration":"Talata"},{"arabic":"أربعة","english":"Four","transliteration":"Arbaa"},{"arabic":"خمسة","english":"Five","transliteration":"Khamsa"},{"arabic":"ستة","english":"Six","transliteration":"Setta"},{"arabic":"سبعة","english":"Seven","transliteration":"Sabaa"},{"arabic":"تمنية","english":"Eight","transliteration":"Tamanya"},{"arabic":"تسعة","english":"Nine","transliteration":"Tesaa"},{"arabic":"عشرة","english":"Ten","transliteration":"Ashara"}],"explanations":[{"english":"In Egyptian Arabic, numbers 1-10 are used very frequently. Memorizing these is key because larger numbers are built using these base words."}]},"exercises":[{"id":"ex_01_match_num","type":"matching","question":{"english":"Match the Egyptian Arabic number to its value.","arabic":"وصل الرقم بمعناه"},"options":[{"arabic":"خمسة","english":"5","transliteration":"Khamsa","isCorrect":true},{"arabic":"تلاتة","english":"3",
